linear.description: Linear MCP Server for issue tracking and project management

setup_instructions: 1. Go to Linear Settings > API > Personal API Keys
2. Create a new API key with appropriate permissions
4. Add this config to your project's .claude/settings.json under mcpServers
common_operations: Create issue: Creates a new issue in specified team/project
List issues: Query issues with filters (status, assignee, priority)
Update issue: Modify issue properties (status, priority, labels)
Add comment: Add comments to existing issues
Create cycle: Create sprints/cycles for project planning
